summary: "Days of Our Lives" is an American TV soap opera that started in 1965 and is now on Peacock. It's about the Brady and Horton families from the fictional city of Salem, Illinois. The show is one of the longest-running TV programs globally, initially airing on NBC. It was created by Ted and Betty Corday and has had famous fans like Julia Roberts. The series is known for tackling bold topics and has been a launching pad for many actors' careers. As of 2023, it's still going strong with new episodes.
title: Days of Our Lives
